name: Roll of Fate
description:
A game made in two weeks (Instead of one month) for Finally Finish Something 2021.

This was our first Game Jam and it was just a good time learning new things and being rewarded with the finished product! 

This is our first game made ever and it certainly feels like it won’t be our last!

Cute game assets by CathBiscuits

Beautifully composed music by t0ranoko 

Adventure written by Hedge

Haha buttons that go brr programmed by Hedge and t0ranoko 

Made on GameMaker Studio 2

Where to find us: 

[Hmmm... something goes here]

*Donations are appreciated but not necessary!
